com.r3corda.core.utilities / ApiUtils / withParty

withParty

fun withParty(partyKeyStr: String, notFound: (String) -> <ERROR CLASS> = defaultNotFound, found: (Party) -> <ERROR CLASS>): <ERROR CLASS>

Get a party and then execute the passed function with the party public key as a parameter. Usage: withParty(key) { doSomethingWith(it) }
